summary: The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.
cast: John Call|Leonard Hicks|Vincent Beck|Bill McCutcheon|Victor Stiles|Donna Conforti|Chris Month|Pia Zadora|Lelia Martin|Charles Renn|James Cahill|Ned Wertimer|Doris Rich|Carl Don|Ivor Bodin|Al Nesor|Josip Elic|Jim Bishop|Lin Thurmond|Don Blair|Tony Ross|Scott Aronesty|Ron Rotholz|Glenn Schaffer|Bryan Lamphere|Gene Lindsey
title: Santa Claus conquista a los marcianos
